taxonomicnotes: The taxonomic identity of populations from mainland southeast Asia and from Sunderland require investigation.
rationale: The species has a wide distribution in southeast Asia; recorded from the Mekong and Chao Phraya basins, as well as from Malaysia (Peninsula, and most likely Sabah and Sarawak), and Indonesia (Sumatra and Kalimantan). It is considered Least Concern at present as there are not thought to be threats across its range.
